<A NAME="eolPage153"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	THIS FOURTH AMENDED AND RESTATED STOCKHOLDERS AGREEMENT (as amended and restated from time to
	time according to its terms, this &#147;
<U>
	Agreement
</U>
	&#148;), dated as of June&nbsp;23, 2015, relating to Univar Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#147;
<U>
	Company
</U>
	&#148;), is entered into by and among the Company, CD&amp;R Univar Holdings,
	L.P., a Cayman Islands exempted limited partnership (&#147;
<U>
	CD&amp;R Investor
</U>
	&#148;), Univar N.V., a limited liability company (
<I>
	naamloze vennootschap
</I>
	) organized under the laws of the Netherlands and with corporate seat in Rotterdam, the
	Netherlands (&#147;
<U>
	Univar NV
</U>
	&#148;), Dahlia Investments Pte. Ltd. (&#147;
<U>
	Temasek Investor
</U>
	&#148;), and each of the stockholders of the Company whose name appears on Annex A hereto (together with and each Person that has previously
	executed or subsequently executes an Accession Agreement, the &#147;
<U>
	Stockholders
</U>
	&#148; and each, individually, a &#147;
<U>
	Stockholder
</U>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	W I T N E S S E T H
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, the Company entered into a Stockholders Agreement, dated as of November&nbsp;30, 2010, with CD&amp;R Investor, the other CD&amp;R
	Investor Parties and Univar NV, as further amended and restated on December&nbsp;20, 2010, in connection with the admission of the Mezzanine Investors as stockholders of the Company and their becoming parties to this Agreement, as further amended
	and restated on March&nbsp;10, 2011 in connection with the admission of the Goldman Sachs Investors and their becoming parties to this Agreement, as further amended and restated on June&nbsp;27, 2012 in connection with the admission of the
	Management Stockholder and it becoming party to this Agreement (the &#147;
<U>
	Original Agreement
</U>
	&#148;);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, in connection with
	the initial public offering of the shares of the Company&#146;s common stock, par value $0.01 per share (the &#147;
<U>
	Shares
</U>
	&#148;), CD&amp;R Investor, Univar NV, Temasek Investor, the Stockholders and the Company desire to amend and restate the
	Original Agreement as provided herein to set forth their respective rights and obligations; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, pursuant
	to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;13.02
</U>
	&nbsp;of the Original Agreement, this amendment and restatement of the Original Agreement has been approved by Stockholders holding a majority of the Shares and has been unanimously approved by CD&amp;R Investor and
	Univar NV.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises and the mutual covenants contained herein and other good and valuable
	consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties hereto hereby agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	[Signature
	Page&nbsp;&#151; Stockholders Agreement]
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage154"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE&nbsp;I
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;1.01.
<U>
	&nbsp;Definitions
</U>
	.&nbsp;The following terms shall, for the purposes of this Agreement, have the following meanings:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Accession Agreement
</U>
	&#148; means an agreement with a prospective additional Stockholder accepting all of the terms and
	conditions of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Affiliate
</U>
	&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any Person directly or indirectly
	controlling, controlled by, or under common control with, such other Person as of the date on which, or at any time during the period for which, the determination of affiliation is being made.&nbsp;For purposes of this definition, the term
	&#147;
<U>
	control
</U>
	&#148; (including the correlative meanings of the terms &#147;
<U>
	controlled by
</U>
	&#148; and &#147;
<U>
	under common control with
</U>
	&#148;), as used with respect to any Person, means the possession, directly or indirectly, of the
	power to direct or cause the direction of the management policies of such Person, whether through the ownership of voting securities or by contract or otherwise.&nbsp;For the purpose of this Agreement, the Company and each other member of the Group
	shall not be deemed an Affiliate of any of the Stockholders.&nbsp;For the purposes of this Agreement, CD&amp;R Manager shall be deemed an Affiliate of each CD&amp;R Investor Party and each of the CVC GPs shall be deemed an Affiliate of Univar
	NV.&nbsp;For the purposes of this Agreement, each of CVC Ulysses and Parcom and their respective Affiliates (other than the Company and its Subsidiaries) shall be deemed Affiliates of Univar NV.&nbsp;For the purposes of Article&nbsp;VII, any
	reference to Temasek Investor&#146;s Affiliates shall mean its ultimate holding company, Temasek Holdings, and Temasek Holdings&#146; direct and indirect wholly owned companies whose boards of directors or equivalent governing bodies are comprised
	solely of nominees or employees of (A)&nbsp;Temasek Holdings; (B)&nbsp;Temasek Pte. Ltd; and/or (C)&nbsp;wholly owned direct or indirect subsidiaries of Temasek Pte. Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

<A NAME="eolPage158"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Mezzanine Subscription Agreements
</U>
	&#148; means the Subscription Agreements entered
	into, as of December&nbsp;20, 2010, by the Company and the Mezzanine Investors, in connection with closing of the transactions contemplated by the Purchase Agreement, dated as of October&nbsp;10, 2010, among the Company, Basic Chemical Solutions,
	L.L.C. and the other parties thereto, pursuant to which the Mezzanine Investors purchased Shares on the terms and conditions set forth therein and the Mezzanine Investors became parties to this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Minimum Amount
</U>
	&#148; means the lowest of (i)&nbsp;$100 million, (ii)&nbsp;if at any time after the IPO, the aggregate value of
	the Shares that are publicly traded is less than $400,000,000, the result of multiplying (x)&nbsp;0.25 and (y)&nbsp;the value of the Shares that are publicly traded as of the close of business on the most recent Business Day or (iii)&nbsp;such
	lesser amount as agreed by Univar NV, CD&amp;R Investor and Temasek Investor.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Organizational Documents
</U>
	&#148; means, with
	respect to any Person, the articles or certificate of incorporation and the by-laws, certificate of formation and operating agreement or other similar organizational documents of such Person.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Original Agreement
</U>
	&#148; has the meaning given such term in the Recitals.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Original Shares
</U>
	&#148; means, when used in reference to any one or more Stockholders, the Shares held by such Stockholder or
	affiliated funds on November&nbsp;30, 2010, or any shares or other securities into which or for which such Shares may have been converted or exchanged in connection with any exchange, reclassification, dividend, distribution, stock split,
	combination, subdivision, merger, spin-off, recapitalization, reorganization or similar transaction.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Parcom
</U>
	&#148; means,
	collectively, Parcom Ulysses 2 S.&agrave; r.l., a&nbsp;
<I>
	soci&eacute;t&eacute; &agrave; responsabilit&eacute; limit&eacute;e
</I>
	&nbsp;organized under the laws of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg and Parcom Buy Out Fund II B.V., a company incorporated
	under the laws of the Netherlands recorded with the Register of the Chamber of Commerce of Gooi en Eemland under the number 32123585.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Permitted Transfer
</U>
	&#148; means a Transfer to a Permitted Transferee (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;in which such Permitted Transferee agrees by
	an Accession Agreement to be bound to the same extent as the Transferring Stockholder (which in the case of the Management Stockholder shall include the Management Subscription Agreements) and any other documentation that the Company may reasonably
	require and (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;which would not require the Company to effect any registration pursuant to the Securities Act or the Exchange Act.
</P>

	GP;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;1.02.
<U>
	&nbsp;Interpretation
</U>
	.&nbsp;Except as the express context otherwise requires:&nbsp;(
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;the meanings given
	to terms defined herein will be equally applicable to both the singular and plural forms of such terms as well as to the uses of such terms as different parts of speech; (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;the heading references herein and the table of contents hereof
	are for convenience only, and shall not be deemed to limit or affect any of the provisions hereof; (
<U>
	iii
</U>
	)&nbsp;the words &#147;hereof,&#148; &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereto,&#148; &#147;hereby&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words of
	similar import, when used in this Agreement, shall refer to this Agreement as a whole and not to any particular provision of this Agreement; (
<U>
	iv
</U>
	)&nbsp;the words &#147;or&#148; and &#147;any&#148; are not exclusive and the words
	&#147;include&#148; and &#147;including&#148; shall be deemed to be followed by the phrase &#147;without limitation&#148;; (
<U>
	v
</U>
	)&nbsp;any reference to Preamble, Recital, Article&nbsp;or a Section&nbsp;shall mean a reference to the Preamble, the
	Recital, an Article&nbsp;or a Section&nbsp;of this Agreement; (
<U>
	vi
</U>
	)&nbsp;a reference to a Person includes its successors and assigns as permitted by this Agreement; (
<U>
	vii
</U>
	)&nbsp;a reference to days means calendar days unless otherwise
	noted; (
<U>
	viii
</U>
	)&nbsp;a reference to any contract includes permitted supplements, amendments and modifications thereof; (
<U>
	ix
</U>
	)&nbsp;a reference to a Law includes any amendment, modification, supplement or replacement of such Law and any
	rules&nbsp;or regulations issued thereunder; (
<U>
	x
</U>
	)&nbsp;the terms &#147;dollars&#148; and &#147;$&#148; mean the currency of the United States of America; (
<U>
	xi
</U>
	)&nbsp;references herein to any gender include each other gender and
	(
<U>
	xii
</U>
	)&nbsp;this Agreement shall be construed as being drafted by all of the parties hereto and no presumption or burden of proof shall arise favoring or disfavoring any party by virtue of the authorship of any provision of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE&nbsp;II
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	BOARD OF DIRECTORS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;2.01.
<U>
	&nbsp;Management Under Direction of the Board
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;The Board shall be constituted as provided in this&nbsp;
<U>
	Article&nbsp;II
</U>
	&nbsp;and in the Organizational Documents of the
	Company.&nbsp;Except as otherwise expressly provided in this Agreement, the management and control of the business and affairs of the Company shall, to the maximum extent permitted by applicable Law, be vested in the Board.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)&nbsp;The Board may, in its sole discretion but subject to the terms of this Agreement, delegate rights and responsibilities regarding
	management of the Company to officers or employees of the Company and subcontract such rights and responsibilities to third parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;2.02.
<U>
	&nbsp;Composition of the Board; Observers
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;The number of directors of the Company (the &#147;
<U>
	Directors
</U>
	&#148;) constituting the Board shall be fixed from time to time by
	the Board in accordance with, and subject to,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	10
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage163"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	the Organizational Documents of the Company and this Agreement, but in no event shall the Board consist of fewer than six or more than fourteen Directors.&nbsp;As of the date hereof, the number
	of Directors of the Company shall be fourteen.&nbsp;The terms of office of members of the Board shall be divided into three classes: Class&nbsp;I Directors, whose initial terms will expire at the annual meeting of stockholders to be held in 2016;
	Class&nbsp;II Directors, whose initial terms will expire at the annual meeting of stockholders to be held in 2017; and Class&nbsp;III Directors, whose initial terms will expire at the annual meeting of stockholders to be held in
	2018.&nbsp;Thereafter, each member will serve three-year terms expiring in successive years. The Company will nominate for election to the Board the Directors designated by Univar NV, the CD&amp;R Investor, Temasek Investor and the Company, as the
	case may be, as set forth below:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i)&nbsp;For so long as Univar NV (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns 50% or
	more of its Original Shares:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(A)&nbsp;Three Directors, who may be employees of Univar NV or its Affiliates, may be
	designated for nomination by Univar NV;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(B)&nbsp;Three independent Directors, who may not be employees of Univar NV or its
	Affiliates, may be designated for nomination by Univar NV;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii)&nbsp;If Univar NV (together with its Permitted
	Transferees) owns less than 50% but not less than 25% of its Original Shares:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(A)&nbsp;Two Directors, who may be employees
	of Univar NV or its Affiliates, may be designated for nomination by Univar NV;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(B)&nbsp;One independent Director, who may
	not be an employee of Univar NV or its Affiliates, may be designated for nomination by Univar NV (the Directors designated for nomination in accordance with clause (a)(i)(B)&nbsp;or this clause (a)(ii)(B), the &#147;
<U>
	Independent Univar NV
	Directors
</U>
	&#148;);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii)&nbsp;If Univar NV (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns less than 25% but not less
	than 5% of its Original Shares, one Director, who may be an employee of Univar NV or its Affiliates, may be designated for nomination by Univar NV (the Directors designated for nomination in accordance with clauses (a)(i)(A), (a)(ii)(A)&nbsp;or this
	clause (a)(iii), the &#147;
<U>
	Univar NV Directors
</U>
	&#148;);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv)&nbsp;If Univar NV (together with its Permitted
	Transferees) owns less than 5% of the percentage of its Original Shares, Univar NV shall cease to have the right to designate any Directors for nomination (including Independent Directors) and any other rights provided under
	this&nbsp;
<U>
	Article&nbsp;II
</U>
	,&nbsp;
<U>
	Article&nbsp;III
</U>
	&nbsp;or&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;4.01
</U>
	;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	11
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage164"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(v)&nbsp;For so long as CD&amp;R Investor (together with its Permitted
	Transferees) owns 50% or more of its Original Shares:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(A)&nbsp;Three Directors (including the Chairman), who may be
	employees of CD&amp;R Investor or its Affiliates, may be designated for nomination by CD&amp;R Investor;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(B)&nbsp;Three
	independent Directors, who may not be employees of CD&amp;R Investor or its Affiliates, may be designated for nomination by CD&amp;R Investor;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vi)&nbsp;If CD&amp;R Investor (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns less than 50% but not less than 25% of its
	Original Shares:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(A)&nbsp;Two Directors, who may be employees of CD&amp;R Investor or its Affiliates, may be designated
	for nomination by CD&amp;R Investor;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(B)&nbsp;One independent Director, who may not be an employee of CD&amp;R Investor or
	its Affiliates, may be designated for nomination by CD&amp;R Investor (the Directors designated for nomination in accordance with clause (a)(v)(B)&nbsp;or this clause (a)(vi)(B), the &#147;
<U>
	Independent CD&amp;R Investor Directors
</U>
	&#148; and,
	together with the Independent Univar NV Directors, the &#147;
<U>
	Independent Directors
</U>
	&#148;);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vii)&nbsp;If CD&amp;R
	Investor (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns less than 25% but not less than 5% of its Original Shares, one Director, who may be an employee of CD&amp;R Investor or its Affiliates, may be designated for nomination by CD&amp;R Investor
	(the Directors designated for nomination in accordance with clauses (a)(v)(A), (a)(vi)(A)&nbsp;or this clause (a)(vii), the &#147;
<U>
	CD&amp;R Investor Directors
</U>
	&#148;);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(viii)&nbsp;If CD&amp;R Investor (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns less than 5% of its Original Shares, CD&amp;R
	Investor shall cease to have the right to designate any Directors for nomination (including Independent Directors) and any other rights provided under
	this&nbsp;
<U>
	Article&nbsp;II
</U>
	,&nbsp;
<U>
	Article&nbsp;III
</U>
	&nbsp;or&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;4.01
</U>
	;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ix)&nbsp;For so
	long as Temasek Investor (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns 10% or more of the outstanding Shares, one Director, who may be an employee of Temasek Investor or its Affiliates, may be designated for nomination by Temasek Investor (the
	&#147;
<U>
	Temasek Investor Director
</U>
	&#148; and, together with the Univar NV Directors and the CD&amp;R Investor Directors, the &#147;
<U>
	Stockholder Appointed Directors
</U>
	&#148;); and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	12
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage165"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(x)&nbsp;One management Director who shall be the CEO (the &#147;
<U>
	Management
	Director
</U>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xi)&nbsp;Notwithstanding the limitations set forth in
	this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.02(a)
</U>
	&nbsp;with respect to &#147;Independent Directors&#148;, each of Univar NV and CD&amp;R Investor may designate for nomination as an Independent Director persons who are currently or have previously served as an
	independent director of a portfolio company of its Affiliates and or any person who was or is an executive of a former portfolio company of its Affiliates;&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	&nbsp;that such person meets any applicable independence requirements of
	a national securities exchange upon which the Shares are listed to which it is then subject.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)&nbsp;The names, categories and classes
	of the Directors (including the Chairman) as of the date hereof are set forth on&nbsp;
<U>
	Schedule 2.02(b)
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)&nbsp;In designating
	Directors, Univar NV, CD&amp;R Investor and Temasek Investor shall endeavor to select individuals who are capable of serving actively on the Board and are reasonably knowledgeable, or capable of becoming reasonably knowledgeable promptly after
	becoming a Director, of the Company&#146;s business and its plans.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d)&nbsp;In the event that a Stockholder loses its right to designate
	for nomination one or more Stockholder Appointed Directors or Independent Directors pursuant to this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.02
</U>
	, it shall cause such Stockholder Appointed Directors or Independent Directors, as applicable, to offer to resign
	immediately, and a successor shall be nominated to the Board in the manner prescribed in the Organizational Documents.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e)&nbsp;Subject
	to the other provisions of this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.02
</U>
	, (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;any Univar NV Director may be removed (with or without cause) at any time only by Univar NV, upon written notice to the Board; (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;any CD&amp;R Investor
	Director may be removed (with or without cause) at any time only by CD&amp;R Investor, upon written notice to the Board; (
<U>
	iii
</U>
	)&nbsp;any Temasek Investor Director may be removed (with or without cause) at any time only by Temasek Investor,
	upon written notice to the Board; (
<U>
	iv
</U>
	)&nbsp;any Independent Univar NV Director,&nbsp;Independent CD&amp;R Investor Director and Management Director may be removed only by mutual consent of Univar NV and CD&amp;R Investor, which consent (in
	each case) shall not be unreasonably withheld; (
<U>
	v
</U>
	)&nbsp;any person designated as the Management Director may not continue to serve on the Board as the Management Director from such time as he or she ceases to be employed as CEO; and
	(
<U>
	vi
</U>
	)&nbsp;Directors shall serve until removed and their respective successors shall have been designated and shall have been qualified and elected.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f)&nbsp;Each Stockholder agrees that, at any time it is entitled to vote on the election of Directors to the Board and for so long as it has
	the right to nominate a Director to the Board pursuant to this Section&nbsp;2.02, it shall vote all of its Capital Stock in
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	13
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage166"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	the Company that is entitled to vote or execute proxies or written consents, as the case may be, and take all other necessary action (including, if permitted under the Organizational Documents,
	causing the Company to call a special meeting of Stockholders) in order to ensure that the composition of the Board is as set forth in this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.02
</U>
	.&nbsp;The Company shall cause each individual designated for nomination
	pursuant to this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.02
</U>
	&nbsp;to be nominated to serve as a Director on the Board and to take all other necessary actions (including, if permitted under the Organizational Documents, calling a special meeting of the Board
	and/or Stockholders) to ensure that the composition of the Board is as set forth in this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.02
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(g)&nbsp;Each
	Stockholder agrees for so long as it has the right to nominate a Director to the Board pursuant to this Section&nbsp;2.02 to vote all of its Capital Stock in the Company entitled to vote, or execute written consents and take all other actions
	reasonably necessary and permitted by applicable Law to (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;to the extent that the Company&#146;s Organizational Documents conflict with any provision of this Agreement, amend such Organizational Documents to eliminate such conflict and
	(
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;mitigate the effects of any such conflict on the parties hereto in a manner that implements the provisions of this Agreement as closely as possible to their intent.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(h)&nbsp;The Company shall reimburse each Stockholder Appointed Director for their reasonable out-of-pocket expenses incurred by them for the
	purpose of attending meetings of the Board or committees thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i)&nbsp;The Company agrees to include in the slate of nominees
	recommended by the Board the Stockholder Appointed Directors and Independent Directors designated for nomination in accordance with clause&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;of this Section&nbsp;2.02 and to use its best efforts to cause the election of each such
	designee to the Board, including nominating such individuals to be elected as Directors as provided herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(j)&nbsp;Except as otherwise
	agreed by the CD&amp;R Investor, Univar NV and Temasek Investor, the Board shall not be expanded to add an additional Director or Directors unless such increase in the size of the Board is necessary to comply with the independence requirements of a
	national securities exchange upon which the Company&#146;s Shares are listed, provided that the agreement of CD&amp;R Investor, Univar NV or Temasek Investor shall no longer be required when such Stockholder or Stockholders cease to have a right to
	nominate a Director to the Board pursuant to this Section&nbsp;2.02.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(k)&nbsp;If at any time CD&amp;R Manager, CD&amp;R Fund VIII or
	their Permitted Transferees cease to control CD&amp;R Investor (or its Permitted Transferee to whom the rights of CD&amp;R Investor were Transferred in accordance with this Agreement), CD&amp;R Investor and its Permitted Transferees shall cease to
	have any rights to which CD&amp;R Investor is specifically entitled under this Agreement (and which rights are not held generally by all other Stockholders).&nbsp;If at any time the CVC GPs or their Permitted Transferees cease to control Univar NV
	(or its Permitted Transferee to whom the rights
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	14
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage167"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	of Univar NV were Transferred in accordance with this Agreement), Univar NV (or its Permitted Transferee to whom the rights of Univar NV were Transferred in accordance with this Agreement) shall
	cease to have any rights to which Univar NV is specifically entitled under this Agreement (and which rights are not held generally by all other Stockholders).&nbsp;If at any time Temasek Holdings or its Permitted Transferees cease to control Temasek
	Investor (or its Permitted Transferee to whom the rights of Temasek Investor were Transferred in accordance with this Agreement), Temasek Investor (or its Permitted Transferee to whom the rights of Temasek Investor were Transferred in accordance
	with this Agreement) shall cease to have any rights to which Temasek Investor is specifically entitled under this Agreement (and which rights are not held generally by all other Stockholders).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;2.03.
<U>
	&nbsp;Chairman
</U>
	.&nbsp;Unless otherwise agreed by CD&amp;R Investor, the chairman of the Board (the
	&#147;
<U>
	Chairman
</U>
	&#148;) shall be designated for nomination by CD&amp;R Investor.&nbsp;As of the date hereof, CD&amp;R Investor has designated the individual so named on&nbsp;
<U>
	Schedule 2.02(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;to serve as Chairman until the earlier of
	his death, resignation or removal by the Board.&nbsp;The Chairman shall be responsible for the preparation of the agenda for each Board meeting (which shall include issues presented by other Directors), determination of the location for such Board
	meeting and conducting each Board meeting.&nbsp;If CD&amp;R Investor (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns less than 25% of its Original Shares, CD&amp;R Investor shall cease to have the right to designate the Chairman.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;2.04.
<U>
	&nbsp;Committees of the Board
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;The Board shall have an Audit Committee, Compensation Committee and Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, and may form
	additional committees upon the approval of the Board (each, a &#147;
<U>
	Committee
</U>
	&#148;).&nbsp;The authority of each Committee shall be determined from time to time by the Board.&nbsp;Committee membership shall be as determined by the
	Board,&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	&nbsp;that, (i)&nbsp;the Directors comprising each Committee shall be proportionate to, and shall reflect, the relative number of Stockholder Appointed Directors of, and Independent Directors designated for nomination by,
	Univar NV, on the one hand, and CD&amp;R Investor, on the other hand; (ii)&nbsp;for so long as Univar NV and CD&amp;R Investor are entitled to any Director (including Independent Univar NV Directors or Independent CD&amp;R Investor Directors), at
	least one Univar NV Director or Independent Univar NV Director and one CD&amp;R Investor Director or Independent CD&amp;R Director shall serve on each Committee; (iii)&nbsp;for so long as Temasek Investor is entitled to any Director, the Temasek
	Investor Director shall be entitled to serve on each of the various Committees; (iv)&nbsp;in the case of (i), (ii)&nbsp;and (iii)&nbsp;above, the right of any Director to serve on a Committee shall be subject to applicable law and the Company&#146;s
	obligation to comply with any applicable independence requirements of a national securities exchange upon which the Shares are listed to which it is then subject; and (v)&nbsp;in the case of (iii)&nbsp;above, the right of the Temasek Investor
	Director to serve on each of the various Committees shall be subject to scheduling and logistical constraints regarding the operation of such Committees.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	15
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage168"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)&nbsp;The Chairman of each Committee shall be designated by a majority of the Directors
	serving on such Committee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE&nbsp;III
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	OFFICERS; INFORMATION RIGHTS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;3.01.
<U>
	&nbsp;Chief Executive Officer
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;For so long as it (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns no less than 25% of its Original Shares, either Univar NV or
	CD&amp;R Investor may terminate the CEO upon 45 days&#146; written notice to the Board, if, (
<U>
	x
</U>
	)&nbsp;in one fiscal year (beginning with the fiscal year ending December&nbsp;31, 2015), the Company&#146;s EBITDA is more than 20% less or
	(
<U>
	y
</U>
	)&nbsp;for two consecutive fiscal years (beginning with the fiscal year ending December&nbsp;31, 2015), the Company&#146;s EBITDA is more than 10% less, in either case, than the projected EBITDA as set forth in the Annual Business Plans to
	which such fiscal years relate.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)&nbsp;In the event that the CEO is dismissed pursuant to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;3.01(a)
</U>
	, an
	operating partner of CD&amp;R Manager designated by CD&amp;R Investor who is then serving (or nominated to serve) as a CD&amp;R Investor Director shall be entitled to serve as CEO on an interim basis (but for a period of no more than one year,
	unless Univar NV otherwise consents) until a replacement CEO is hired (during which time the Board seat to which the CEO as a Management Director is entitled pursuant to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.02(a)(x)
</U>
	&nbsp;shall remain vacant).&nbsp;CD&amp;R
	Investor and Univar NV shall cooperate in good faith and use commercially reasonable efforts to jointly agree on a new permanent CEO.&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;3.01(b)
</U>
	, if no replacement CEO has
	been hired with the approval of Univar NV and CD&amp;R Investor prior to the first anniversary of the former CEO&#146;s termination or resignation, then the Independent Directors shall (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;consult with each of Univar NV and CD&amp;R
	Investor as to their view of the appropriate candidate or candidates for the CEO position and consider in good faith such views and (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;select and hire a replacement CEO by vote of a majority of the Independent Directors (and without
	the need for the approval of Univar NV or CD&amp;R Investor) within fifteen months after the former CEO&#146;s termination or resignation, and until such fifteen month anniversary, the CD&amp;R Investor Director serving as the interim CEO as
	contemplated by this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;3.01(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;shall continue to so serve.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;3.02.
<U>
	&nbsp;Annual Business
	Plan
</U>
	.&nbsp;The Company shall develop a detailed proposed annual business plan and budget for each upcoming fiscal year, beginning with January&nbsp;1, 2016 (&#147;
<U>
	Annual Business Plan
</U>
	&#148;).&nbsp;The CEO shall submit such proposal for
	the consideration of the Board and the Board shall cooperate to set a schedule with
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	16
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage169"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	management to approve such proposal.&nbsp;After the Board approves the Annual Business Plan for a given fiscal year, the Company and other members of the Group shall conduct their respective
	business, including its capital and other expenditure programs, in accordance therewith.&nbsp;After the Board&#146;s approval, for so long as Univar NV or the CD&amp;R Investor (together with its Permitted Transferees), as applicable, owns at least
	5% of its Original Shares and for so long as Temasek Investor (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns 10% or more of the outstanding Shares,&nbsp;the Company shall make available to Univar NV, CD&amp;R Investor and Temasek Investor the Annual
	Business Plan, no later than thirty days before the beginning of the Company&#146;s next fiscal year, in such manner and form as approved by the Board, which shall include at least a projection of income and a projected cash flow statement for each
	fiscal quarter in such fiscal year and a projected balance sheet as of the end of each fiscal quarter in such fiscal year, in each case prepared in reasonable detail, with appropriate presentation and discussion of the principal assumptions upon
	which such budgets and projections are based, which shall be accompanied by the statement of the CEO or CFO or equivalent officer of the Company to the effect that such budget and projections are based on reasonable and good faith estimates and
	assumptions made by the management of the Company for the respective periods covered thereby; it being recognized that such budgets and projections as to future events are not to be viewed as facts and that actual results during the period or
	periods covered by them may differ from the projected results.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;3.03.
<U>
	&nbsp;Periodic Reports
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;For so long as Univar NV or the CD&amp;R Investor (together with its Permitted Transferees), as applicable, owns at least 5% of its
	Original Shares and for so long as or Temasek Investor (together with its Permitted Transferees) owns 10% or more of the outstanding Shares, as promptly as practicable and in any event within 60 days after the end of each fiscal year, the Company
	shall prepare and make available to each of Univar NV, the CD&amp;R Investor and Temasek Investor, the following financial statements with respect to the Group audited by the Auditor and prepared in accordance with GAAP applied on a consistent basis
	throughout the periods involved:&nbsp;(
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;a consolidated balance sheet as of the end of such fiscal year; (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;a consolidated statement of income for such fiscal year; (
<U>
	iii
</U>
	)&nbsp;a consolidated statement of cash flows
	for such fiscal year; and (
<U>
	iv
</U>
	)&nbsp;notes to the foregoing, setting forth in each case (other than the notes described in clause (iv)) in comparative form the figures for the previous fiscal year, all in reasonable detail and accompanied by
	the opinion of independent public accountants of recognized national standing selected by the Company, and a Company-prepared comparison to the Annual Business Plan for such year as approved by the Board.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)&nbsp;The members of the Group shall close the books of account after the end of each month in each fiscal year and management of the
	Company shall provide information in reasonable detail to each Stockholder with respect to the results of operations of the Group during such month.&nbsp;Such information shall include an unaudited
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	17
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage170"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	consolidated balance sheet of the Company and its Subsidiaries as of the end of such monthly period and consolidated statements of operations, income, cash flows, retained earnings and
	stockholders&#146; equity of the Company and its Subsidiaries, for each month and for the current fiscal year of the Company to date, prepared in accordance with GAAP (subject to normal year-end audit adjustments and the absence of notes thereto),
	together with a comparison of actual year-to-date, remainder of the year as budgeted and the full year as budgeted information for the Group and a budget reforecast of profits and losses.&nbsp;Such information shall be delivered to each Stockholder
	no later than 20 days after the end of each month and no later than 60 days after the end of each fiscal year in respect of such fiscal year.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)&nbsp;The Company shall provide to each of Univar NV, the CD&amp;R Investor Parties, Temasek Investor and their respective Permitted
	Transferees such additional reports as may be reasonably requested as and when required to comply with such Stockholder&#146;s financial reporting practices as in effect from time to time.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;3.04.
<U>
	&nbsp;Access
</U>
	.&nbsp;Subject to the provisions of&nbsp;
<U>
	Article&nbsp;VII
</U>
	, the Company shall, and shall cause its
	Subsidiaries, officers, directors, employees, auditors and other agents to, so long as Univar NV and CD&amp;R Investor (in each case, together with its Permitted Transferees) owns at least 5% of its Original Shares and so long as Temasek Investor
	(together with its Permitted Transferees) owns at least 10% of the outstanding Shares, (
<U>
	a
</U>
	)&nbsp;afford the officers, employees, auditors and other agents of Univar NV, CD&amp;R Investor and Temasek Investor, during normal business hours and
	upon reasonable notice reasonable access at all reasonable times to its officers, employees, auditors, legal counsel, properties, offices, plants and other facilities and to all books and records, and (
<U>
	b
</U>
	)&nbsp;afford Univar NV, CD&amp;R
	Investor and Temasek Investor the opportunity to discuss the affairs, finances and accounts of the Company and its Subsidiaries with their respective officers from time to time as each may reasonably request.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE&nbsp;IV
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	TRANSFERS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;4.01.
<U>
	&nbsp;Restriction on Transfers
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything else to the contrary in this Agreement, no Stockholders may, directly or indirectly, Transfer any Company
	Capital Stock legally or beneficially owned by them other than:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i)&nbsp;in a Permitted Transfer to such
	Stockholder&#146;s Permitted Transferees;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii)&nbsp;pursuant to the IPO;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	18
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage171"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii)
<I>
	&nbsp;de minimis
</I>
	&nbsp;Transfers by Univar NV, a CD&amp;R Investor
	Party, Temasek Investor, a Goldman Sachs Investor, a Mezzanine Investor or their respective Permitted Transferees constituting (together with any other&nbsp;
<I>
	de minimis
</I>
	&nbsp;Transfers previously made by any such Stockholder (for purposes of
	this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;4.01(a)(iii)
</U>
	, the CD&amp;R Investor Parties shall be regarded as one Stockholder and the Goldman Sachs Investors shall be regarded as one Stockholder) and its Permitted Transferees pursuant to this clause, and taking
	into account any stock split, combination, reclassification or similar transaction) no more than 1% of the outstanding Shares per calendar year;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv)&nbsp;solely with respect to GSO Fund, a pledge of Company Capital Stock solely in connection with a fund level financing
	of GSO Fund where assets of GSO Fund are pledged; provided that the pledgee shall have delivered an executed Accession Agreement to the Company which shall become effective immediately upon the foreclosure of any amount of pledged Company Capital
	Stock;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(v)&nbsp;with the prior written consent of the Coordination Committee and subject to compliance with applicable
	securities laws and&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.01
</U>
	;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vi)&nbsp;with respect to Temasek Investor, when it ceases to own at
	least 10% of the outstanding Shares, without limitation, subject to compliance with applicable securities laws;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vii)&nbsp;with respect to the Mezzanine Investors, at such time as the Coordination Committee is dissolved in accordance
	with&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.01
</U>
	, without limitation, subject to compliance with applicable securities laws; or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vii)&nbsp;at such time as the Coordination Committee is dissolved in accordance with&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.01
</U>
	, pursuant
	to the exercise of any registration rights or other rights granted by this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE&nbsp;V
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	REGISTRATION RIGHTS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;5.01.
<U>
	&nbsp;Coordination Committee
</U>
	.&nbsp;Univar NV, CD&amp;R Investor and Temasek Investor shall form a committee (the
	&#147;
<U>
	Coordination Committee
</U>
	&#148;) responsible for facilitating coordination among the Stockholders with respect to all Transfer activities by the Stockholders.&nbsp;The Coordination Committee shall be comprised of three members, which will
	initially be one representative designated by each of Univar NV, CD&amp;R Investor and Temasek Investor,&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	&nbsp;that Temasek Investor shall no longer have the right to designate a member of the Coordination Committee at such time
	as Temasek Investor and its Permitted Transferees collectively own less than 10% of the outstanding
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	19
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage172"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Shares.&nbsp;In the event that a Temasek Investor can no longer designate a member of the Coordination Committee, the third member of the Coordination Committee shall be agreed upon by Univar NV
	and CD&amp;R Investor.&nbsp;Following the IPO, the Coordination Committee shall coordinate all Transfers, sales and other dispositions of Shares, including, without limitation, Rule&nbsp;144 sales, distributions to limited partners, shelf takedowns
	and block trades, such that each of Univar NV, the CD&amp;R Investor Parties, Temasek Investor, the Goldman Sachs Investors, the Mezzanine Investors and the Management Stockholder and their respective Permitted Transferees shall have the opportunity
	to participate on a&nbsp;
<I>
	pro rata
</I>
	&nbsp;basis.&nbsp;Any action of, or matter to be approved by, the Coordination Committee shall require the approval of a majority of its total membership and such approval shall be required for all Transfers
	described in this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.01
</U>
	&nbsp;by any Stockholder or its Affiliates except as set forth in&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;4.01
</U>
	&nbsp;and&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	&nbsp;that Transfers by Temasek Investor and its Permitted Transferees shall
	no longer require the approval of the Coordination Committee at such time as Temasek Investor and its Permitted Transferees collectively own less than 10% of the outstanding Shares.&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Coordination Committee
	shall be dissolved and shall have no further authority with respect to Transfers at such time as at least 65% of the outstanding Shares are publicly traded.&nbsp;So long as a Stockholder maintains a representative appointed as a member of the
	Coordination Committee, each such Stockholder hereby agrees to (1)&nbsp;promptly inform each other Stockholder with a Stockholder representative appointed as a member of the Coordination Committee at such time of any changes in such
	Stockholder&#146;s beneficial ownership in the Company and (2)&nbsp;cooperate promptly with the reasonable request of any other Stockholder with respect to any other information about such Stockholder or such Stockholder&#146;s investment in the
	Company that is reasonably required for any Stockholder to make filings that it may be required to make under any applicable U.S. federal or state securities law (including Section&nbsp;13 or Section&nbsp;16 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934,
	as amended).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;5.02.
<U>
	&nbsp;Demand Registration
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;Subject to the provisions of this&nbsp;
<U>
	Article&nbsp;V
</U>
	, until the first date on which there are no Registrable Shares (the
	&#147;
<U>
	Registration Termination Date
</U>
	&#148;), each of Univar NV, CD&amp;R Investor and Temasek Investor may at any time request (at which time, such requesting Stockholder shall be referred to as the &#147;
<U>
	Initiating Stockholder
</U>
	&#148;)
	in writing registration for resale under the Securities Act of all or part of the Registrable Shares separate from an S-3 Shelf Registration (a &#147;
<U>
	Demand Registration
</U>
	&#148;);&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,
<U>
	however
</U>
	, that (based on the
	then-current market prices) the number of Registrable Shares included in the Demand Registration would, if fully sold, yield gross proceeds (prior to deducting underwriting discounts and commission and offering expenses) to such Stockholder of at
	least the Minimum Amount.&nbsp;Upon such request, the Company shall promptly, but no later than two days after such request, deliver notice of such request to all other Stockholders.&nbsp;The other Stockholders shall then have three days to notify
	the Company in writing of their desire to be included in such registration.&nbsp;If the request for registration
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	20
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage173"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	contemplates an Underwritten Offering, the Company shall state such in the written notice and in such event the right of any other Stockholder to participate in such registration shall be
	conditioned upon such Stockholder&#146;s participation in such Underwritten Offering and the inclusion of such Stockholder&#146;s Registrable Shares in the Underwritten Offering to the extent provided herein.&nbsp;Subject
	to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.03(d)
</U>
	,&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.05
</U>
	&nbsp;and&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.09
</U>
	, the Company shall use reasonable best efforts (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;to file a Registration Statement registering for resale such number of
	Registrable Shares as requested to be so registered together with all or such portion of the Registrable Shares of any Stockholder joining in such request which have provided notification to the Company pursuant to
	this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.02(a)
</U>
	&nbsp;(a &#147;
<U>
	Demand Registration Statement
</U>
	&#148;) within 30 days and (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;if necessary, to cause such Demand Registration Statement to be declared effective by the SEC as soon as practicable
	thereafter.&nbsp;If permitted under the Securities Act, such Registration Statement shall be one that is automatically effective upon filing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)&nbsp;Subject to the limitations of&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.02(a)
</U>
	&nbsp;and&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.02(d)
</U>
	, (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;each of
	Univar NV and CD&amp;R Investor (in each case, on behalf of itself and its Affiliates and their Permitted Transferees) shall be entitled to request up to five Demand Registrations in the aggregate, so long as Univar NV or CD&amp;R Investor (in each
	case, together with its Permitted Transferees), as the case may be, owns 5% or more of the outstanding Shares and (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;until such time as the Company becomes eligible to register Shares on Form&nbsp;S-3 (or any successor form thereto)
	and so long as Temasek Investor owns 10% or more of the outstanding Shares, Temasek Investor (on behalf of itself and its Affiliates and their Permitted Transferees) shall be entitled to request up to three Demand
	Registrations,&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	&nbsp;that Temasek Investor shall only be entitled to request for one Demand Registration during the period from the date of the IPO until the end of the 12th&nbsp;full calendar month following the date of the IPO
	and&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,&nbsp;
<U>
	further
</U>
	&nbsp;that in the event that the Company ceases to be eligible to register Shares on Form&nbsp;S-3 after becoming so eligible, Temasek Investor shall be entitled to request up to three Demand
	Registrations less the number of prior Demand Registrations requested by Temasek Investor.&nbsp;A Registration Statement shall not count against the number of permitted Demand Registration unless and until it has become effective.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)&nbsp;The Company may include its own Capital Stock in a Demand Registration or Underwritten Shelf Takedown on the terms provided below;
	and if such Demand Registration is an Underwritten Offering or an Underwritten Shelf Takedown, such Capital Stock may be included only with the consent of the managing underwriters of such offering and Univar NV and CD&amp;R Investor.&nbsp;If the
	managing underwriters of the requested Demand Registration or Underwritten Shelf Takedown advise the Company and the Initiating Stockholder that in their good faith opinion the amount of Capital Stock proposed to be included in the Demand
	Registration or Underwritten Shelf Takedown exceeds the amount of Capital Stock which can be sold in such Underwritten Offering without materially delaying or jeopardizing the success of the offering (including the price per share of the Capital
	Stock proposed to be sold in such Underwritten Offering),
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	21
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage174"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	the Company shall include in such Demand Registration or Underwritten Shelf Takedown, as the case may be, (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;first, the number of Registrable Shares that Univar NV, the CD&amp;R
	Investor Parties, Temasek Investor, the Mezzanine Investors, the Goldman Sachs Investors and their respective Permitted Transferees propose to sell in such offering, (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;second, the amount of Capital Stock the Company proposes to issue
	and (
<U>
	iii
</U>
	)&nbsp;third, the number of Registrable Shares of any other Stockholder who has given notice to be included in such registration or has exercised piggyback rights pursuant
	to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.03
</U>
	;&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	&nbsp;that, if the entirety of the Registrable Shares in clause (i), (ii)&nbsp;or (iii)&nbsp;cannot be included, the Registrable Shares to be included pursuant to each subsection shall be
	determined on a&nbsp;
<I>
	pro rata
</I>
	&nbsp;basis among the Stockholders selling pursuant to such subsection on the basis of the number of Registrable Shares requested to be included therein by each selling Stockholder relative to the total number of
	Registrable Shares requested to be included therein by all such selling Stockholders and&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,&nbsp;
<U>
	further
</U>
	, that, after the IPO, until the earlier of (I)&nbsp;the consummation of the second Demand Registration after the IPO
	and (II)&nbsp;such time as the percentage of the CD&amp;R Investor Parties&#146; Original Shares owned by the CD&amp;R Investor Parties is no greater than the percentage of Univar NV&#146;s Original Shares owned by Univar NV, (x)&nbsp;the pro rata
	allocation of Registrable Shares to be allocated to Univar NV pursuant to the immediately preceding proviso above shall be reduced by a number of shares equal to 30% (such number of shares, the &#147;Reduction Amount&#148;); and (y)&nbsp;the number
	of Registrable Shares allocated to the CD&amp;R Investor Parties pursuant to the immediately preceding proviso above will be the sum of (A)&nbsp;the pro rata allocation of Registrable Shares to be allocated to the CD&amp;R Investor Parties pursuant
	to the immediately preceding proviso above plus (B)&nbsp;the Reduction Amount.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d)&nbsp;No Stockholder shall be entitled to request a
	Demand Registration within 90 days of the effective date of a Demand Registration, Piggyback Registration pursuant to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.03
</U>
	&nbsp;or an Underwritten Shelf Takedown requested pursuant
	to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.04(b)
</U>
	;&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	&nbsp;that a Stockholder shall be entitled to request a Demand Registration at any time after such time as the Coordination Committee has been dissolved pursuant to the terms
	of&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.01
</U>
	.&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Company shall not be obligated to proceed with a Demand Registration if the offering to be effected pursuant to such registration can be effected pursuant to an S-3 Shelf
	Registration and the Company, in accordance with&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.04
</U>
	, effects or has effected an S-3 Shelf Registration pursuant to which such offering can be effected.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e)&nbsp;Upon the date of effectiveness of any Demand Registration for an Underwritten Offering and if such offering is priced promptly on or
	after such date, the Company shall use reasonable best efforts to keep such Demand Registration Statement effective for a period equal to 180 days from such date or such shorter period which shall terminate when all of the Registrable Shares covered
	by such Demand Registration have been sold by the Stockholders who had requested to be included in such registration,
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,&nbsp;
<U>
	however
</U>
	, that such period shall be extended for a period of time equal to the
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	22
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage175"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	period the applicable holder of Registrable Shares refrains from selling any securities included in such Registration Statement at the request of the Company or an underwriter pursuant to the
	provisions of this Agreement.&nbsp;If the Company shall withdraw any Demand Registration pursuant to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.05
</U>
	&nbsp;before the end of such 180 day period and before all of the Registrable Shares covered by such Demand
	Registration have been sold pursuant thereto, the Initiating Stockholder shall be entitled to a replacement Demand Registration which shall be subject to all of the provisions of this&nbsp;
<U>
	Article&nbsp;V
</U>
	.&nbsp;A Demand Registration shall not
	count against the limit on the number of such registrations set forth in&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.02(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;if (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;after the applicable Registration Statement has become effective, such Registration Statement or the related offer,
	sale or distribution of Registrable Shares thereunder becomes the subject of any stop order, injunction or other order or restriction imposed by the SEC or any other governmental agency and such interference is not thereafter eliminated so as to
	permit the completion of the contemplated distribution of Registrable Shares or (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;in the case of an Underwritten Offering, the conditions specified in the related underwriting agreement, if any, are not satisfied or waived for any
	reason not attributable to the Initiating Stockholder or its Affiliates, or (
<U>
	iii
</U>
	)&nbsp;as a result of&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.02(c)
</U>
	, less than 75% of the Initiating Stockholder&#146;s Registrable Shares requested to be included in the
	Registration Statement are included in such Registration Statement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f)&nbsp;Holders of a majority of the Registrable Shares which are to
	be registered in a particular offering pursuant to this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.02
</U>
	&nbsp;shall have the right, prior to the effectiveness of the Registration Statement, to notify the Company that they have determined that the Registration
	Statement be abandoned or withdrawn, in which event the Company shall abandon or withdraw such Registration Statement.&nbsp;Any holder of Registrable Shares who has elected to sell Registrable Shares in an Underwritten Offering pursuant to
	this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.02
</U>
	&nbsp;(including the Stockholder who delivered the Demand Registration request) shall be permitted to withdraw from such registration by written notice to the Company if the price to the public at which the
	Registrable Shares are proposed to be sold will be less than 90% of the average closing price of the class of stock being sold in the offering during the 10 trading days preceding the date on which the notice of such offering was given pursuant
	to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.02(a)
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(g)&nbsp;If the Initiating Stockholder intends that the Registrable Shares requested to be covered
	by a Demand Registration shall be distributed by means of an Underwritten Offering, the Initiating Stockholder shall so advise the Company as a part of its request for a Demand Registration and the Company shall include such information in the
	notice sent by the Company to the other Stockholders with respect to such Demand Registration.&nbsp;In such event or in the case of an Underwritten Shelf Takedown, the lead underwriter to administer the offering shall be chosen by the Initiating
	Stockholder, subject to the prior written consent, not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed, of the Company.&nbsp;If the offering covered by a Demand Registration is to be an Underwritten Offering or in any Underwritten Shelf Takedown, the right
	of any Stockholder to registration in such
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	23
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage176"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	offering will be conditioned upon such Stockholder&#146;s participation in such Underwritten Offering and the inclusion of such Stockholder&#146;s Registrable Shares in the Underwritten Offering
	(unless otherwise agreed by the Initiating Stockholder) and each such Stockholder will (together with the Company and the other Stockholders distributing their securities through such underwriting) enter into an underwriting agreement in customary
	form with the underwriter(s)&nbsp;selected for such underwriting (including pursuant to the terms of any over-allotment or &#147;green shoe&#148; option requested by the managing underwriter(s),&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	&nbsp;that (
<U>
	A
</U>
	)&nbsp;no
	Stockholder shall be required to sell more than the number of Registrable Shares that such Stockholder has requested the Company to include in any registration) and (
<U>
	B
</U>
	)&nbsp;if any Stockholder disapproves of the terms of the underwriting,
	such Stockholder may elect to withdraw therefrom by written notice to the Company, the managing underwriter(s)&nbsp;and the Initiating Stockholder,&nbsp;
<U>
	provided further
</U>
	&nbsp;that no such Person (other than the Company) shall be required to
	make any representations or warranties other than those related to title and ownership of, and power and authority to Transfer, shares and as to the accuracy and completeness of statements made in a Registration Statement, Prospectus or other
	document in reliance upon, and in conformity with, written information prepared and furnished to the Company or the managing underwriter(s)&nbsp;by such Stockholder pertaining exclusively to such Stockholder.&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, no
	Stockholder shall be required to agree to any indemnification obligations on the part of such Stockholder that are greater than its obligations pursuant to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.09(b)
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;5.03.
<U>
	&nbsp;Piggyback Registrations
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)&nbsp;Whenever after the date of this Agreement and prior to the Registration Termination Date the Company proposes to register any Capital
	Stock under the Securities Act (other than on a registration statement on Form&nbsp;S-8, F-8, S-4 or F-4), whether for its own account or for the account of one or more Stockholders, and the form of registration statement to be used may be used for
	any registration of Registrable Shares (a &#147;
<U>
	Piggyback Registration
</U>
	&#148;), the Company shall give written notice to each Stockholder of its intention to effect such a Piggyback Registration and, subject
	to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.03(b)
</U>
	, shall include in such registration statement and in any offering to be made pursuant to such registration statement all Registrable Shares with respect to which the Company has received a written request for
	inclusion therein from any Stockholder within three days after receipt of the Company&#146;s notice.&nbsp;The Company shall have no obligation to proceed with any Piggyback Registration and may abandon, terminate and/or withdraw such Piggyback
	Registration for any reason at any time prior to the pricing thereof&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	, however, that any such abandonment, termination or withdrawal shall not prejudice the rights of the Stockholders to make a Demand Registration request or a
	Shelf Registration request pursuant to the terms of this Agreement.&nbsp;If the Company or any other Person other than a Stockholder proposes to sell Shares in any Underwritten Offering pursuant to a Registration Statement on Form&nbsp;S-3 under the
	Securities Act, such offering shall be treated as a primary or secondary Underwritten Offering pursuant to a Piggyback Registration.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	24
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage177"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)&nbsp;Subject to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.03(c)
</U>
	&nbsp;if a Piggyback Registration is
	initiated as an Underwritten Offering on behalf of the Company or any Stockholder and the managing underwriters advise the Company and each Stockholder that has elected to include Registrable Shares in such Piggyback Registration that in their good
	faith opinion the amount of Capital Stock proposed to be included in such offering exceeds the amount of Capital Stock (of any class) which can be sold in such offering without materially delaying or jeopardizing the success of the offering
	(including the price per share of the Shares proposed to be sold in such offering), the Company shall include in such Piggyback Registration and offering (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;first, the amount of Capital Stock the Company proposes to issue,
	(
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;second, the number of Registrable Shares that Univar NV, the CD&amp;R Investor Parties, Temasek Investor, the Mezzanine Investors, the Goldman Sachs Investors and their respective Permitted Transferees propose to sell in such
	offering on a&nbsp;
<I>
	pro rata
</I>
	&nbsp;basis relative to the total number of Registrable Shares requested to be included therein by such Stockholders and (
<U>
	iii
</U>
	)&nbsp;third, the number of Registrable Shares of any other Stockholder who has
	given notice to be included in such registration pursuant to this&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.03
</U>
	&nbsp;on a&nbsp;
<I>
	pro rata
</I>
	&nbsp;basis relative to the total number of Registrable Shares requested to be included therein by such Stockholders.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)&nbsp;If any Piggyback Registration is a primary Underwritten Offering, the Company shall have the right to select the managing underwriter
	or underwriters to administer any such offering.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d)&nbsp;No Stockholder may sell Registrable Shares in any offering pursuant to a
	Piggyback Registration unless it (
<U>
	i
</U>
	)&nbsp;agrees to sell such Shares on the same basis provided in the underwriting or other distribution arrangements approved by the Company and that apply to the Company and/or any other Stockholders
	involved in such Piggyback Registration on the same terms and conditions as apply to the Company, with such differences, including any with respect to representations and warranties or indemnification and liability insurance, as may be customary or
	appropriate in combined primary and secondary offerings (but no Stockholder shall be required to agree to any indemnification obligations on the part of such Stockholder that are greater than its obligations pursuant
	to&nbsp;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.09(b)
</U>
	);&nbsp;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	&nbsp;that no Stockholder shall be required to make any representations or warranties other than those related to title and ownership of, and power and authority to Transfer the Shares it
	seeks to sell and as to the accuracy and completeness of statements made in a Registration Statement, Prospectus or other document in reliance upon, and in conformity with, written information prepared and furnished to the Company or the managing
	underwriter(s)&nbsp;by such Person pertaining exclusively to such Stockholder and (
<U>
	ii
</U>
	)&nbsp;completes and executes all questionnaires, powers of attorney, indemnities, underwriting agreements, lockups and other documents required under the
	terms of such arrangements.&nbsp;If a registration requested pursuant to
</P>
